sourcesContent:
// src/data/courtsSeed.js
// Oʻahu open play seed data (based on the list you pasted)

export const COURTS_SEED = [
  {
    id: "diamond-head-tennis-center",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Diamond Head Tennis Center",
    address: "3908 Pāki Ave., Honolulu, HI 96815",
    lat: 21.26336,
    lng: -157.81788,
    courts: 4,
    openPlayLevel: "All levels (mostly intermediate)",
    parking: "Small on-site lot + street parking nearby",
    notes:
      "Popular daily open play. Paddle rack/stack system. Best time: 8am–10am. Games typically to 11, win by 2.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"], start: "07:00", end: "14:00", label: "Daily Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["Tourist-friendly", "Consistent schedule", "Paddle rack"],
  },

  {
    id: "fort-derussy-beach-park",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Fort DeRussy Beach Park",
    address: "2131 Kalia Rd, Honolulu, HI 96815",
    lat: 21.2838889,
    lng: -157.8391667,
    courts: 4,
    openPlayLevel: "All levels",
    parking: "Paid Waikīkī parking (limited free options)",
    notes:
      "Steps from the beach, easy walk for Waikīkī visitors. Best times: morning or late afternoon.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"], start: "07:30", end: "17:30", label: "Daily Open Play" },
      { days: ["Jun","Jul","Aug"], start: "07:30", end: "18:30", label: "Summer extended hours" },
    ],
    tags: ["Beach vibe", "Great for visitors"],
  },

  {
    id: "ewa-mahiko-district-park",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "ʻEwa Mahiko District Park",
    address: "91-1205 Renton Rd., Ewa Beach, HI 96706",
    lat: 21.3438889,
    lng: -158.0375,
    courts: 8,
    openPlayLevel: "All levels",
    parking: "Adjacent parking near the courts",
    notes:
      "Very popular open play spot. Best to arrive right when sessions start (8am or 6pm).",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Mon","Tue","Thu"], start: "08:00", end: "12:00", label: "Morning Open Play" },
      { days: ["Tue","Thu","Sat"], start: "18:00", end: "22:00", label: "Evening Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["Big community", "Lots of courts"],
  },

  {
    id: "keehi-lagoon-pickleball-courts",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Keʻehi Pickleball Courts (Keʻehi Lagoon)",
    address: "465 Lagoon Dr, Honolulu, HI 96819",
    lat: 21.3312745,
    lng: -157.8975248,
    courts: 6,
    openPlayLevel: "All levels",
    parking: "Free lot adjacent to the courts",
    notes:
      "Standalone facility feel. Great place to meet new players. Best around 5pm.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Sun"], start: "16:00", end: "19:00", label: "Sunday Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["Large facility", "Free parking"],
  },

  {
    id: "mililani-neighborhood-park",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Mililani Neighborhood Park",
    address: "95-245 Kaloapau St, Mililani, HI 96789",
    lat: 21.45322,
    lng: -158.019118,
    courts: 3,
    openPlayLevel: "Beginner → Intermediate",
    parking: "On-site parking available",
    notes:
      "Quick morning open play (great before work). Best time: show up around 8am.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri"], start: "07:45", end: "09:15", label: "Weekday Morning Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["Morning session", "Beginner-friendly"],
  },

  {
    id: "kamilooiki-community-park",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Kamiloʻiki Community Park",
    address: "7750 Hawaii Kai Dr, Honolulu, HI 96825",
    lat: 21.2958737,
    lng: -157.6867134,
    courts: 2,
    openPlayLevel: "Beginner → Intermediate",
    parking: "On-site parking available",
    notes:
      "Relaxed Sunday session. Usually 1–2 courts set aside for open play.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Sun"], start: "08:30", end: "12:00", label: "Sunday Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["Chill vibe", "Sunday mornings"],
  },

  {
    id: "ala-moana-regional-park",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Ala Moana Regional Park",
    address: "1201 Ala Moana Blvd, Honolulu, HI 96814",
    lat: 21.290754,
    lng: -157.85094,
    courts: 3,
    openPlayLevel: "Beginner → Intermediate",
    parking: "On-site parking lots (walk to courts)",
    notes:
      "Evening open play near the tennis courts (mauka side). Arrive before 6pm; it fills fast.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Wed","Fri"], start: "18:00", end: "21:00", label: "Evening Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["After work", "Central location"],
  },

  {
    id: "petrie-community-park",
    island: "Oahu",
    name: "Petrie Community Park",
    address: "1039 20th Ave., Honolulu, HI 96816",
    lat: 21.276351549,
    lng: -157.790970923,
    courts: 3,
    openPlayLevel: "Intermediate (3.0–4.0)",
    parking: "On-site parking (short walk to courts)",
    notes:
      "Lit courts at night. Great place for intermediate play. Show up at 6pm start.",
    sessions: [
      { days: ["Tue"], start: "18:00", end: "21:00", label: "Tuesday Intermediate Open Play" },
    ],
    tags: ["Intermediate", "Night lights"],
  },
];
